body.p: TokenScript is a tokenisation framework to make tokens work on various websites and wallets. It does so by including token issuers's signed UI and transaction generation code, and run it securely in user's browser/wallet.
For a token issuer, lets you package the essential HTML/JavaScript needed to access their token contract and let it run in user's wallet as mini dapp, or with other websites that uses your token.
For a website owner, TokenScript lets you use tokens on your website easily.
